data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The economics of the situation are unavoidable. We ____ to ____ the ____ to ____ state. The ____ laws ____ this ____ are ____ longer ____ for ____ businesses. We will inevitably lose some employees in the move, but we will be able to save many jobs and avoid some layoffs this way.
data.partBlankContent: The economics of the situation are unavoidable. We ne__ to relo____ the com____ to ano____ state. The t__ laws i_ this o__ are n_ longer favo_____ for la___ businesses. data.fullContent: The economics of the situation are unavoidable. We need to relocate the company to another state. The tax laws in this one are no longer favorable for large businesses. We will inevitably lose some employees in the move, but we will be able to save many jobs and avoid some layoffs this way.
data.answer: 经济形势是不可避免的。我们需要把公司迁到另一个州。这里的税法对劳务企业不再有利。我们将不可避免地在迁移中失去一些员工，但我们将能够保留许多工作岗位，并避免一些裁员。
